DataElement.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past One Month How Often Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Wake You from Sleep Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past one month, how often ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises woke them from sleep, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past 30 Days How Often Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Wake You from Sleep Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how often ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises woke an individual up from sleep._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Often Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Wake You from Sleep Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how often ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises woke an individual up from sleep.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Often Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Wake You from Sleep
Concepts.definition: A question about how often ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises woke an individual up from sleep.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

PermissibleValues.value: Did not hear ringing or other noises OR ringing or other noises did not wake me from sleep

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Did Not Hear Ringing or Other Noises Or Ringing or Other Noises Did Not Wake Me From Sleep

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
